inn1.comm: outside the off stump, straight away beats the outside edge
short outside the off stump, Tamim lets it go to the keeper
outside the off stump, Tamim goes for the expansive drive and misses
pitches on the off stump and swinging away, left alone by Tamim
on the pads, tries to flick it and eventually fails to read the swing and struck on the pads
on the off stump, and swinging away from short of length, left alone
Ripper first up, Squares up the batsman, who is facing his first ball at the international level
fuller on the middle stump, defended back to the bowler
outside off, short in length. Junaid goes back and guides the ball to backward point
swinging away from the off stump, left alone by Junaid
on the leg stump, Junaid turns his wrists for a couple, his first in international cricket
short outside off, defended back to the bowler on the back foot
outside off, short in length. Tamim defends with soft hands and runs across
outside off and swinging away a touch, left alone by Junaid
good length delivery outside off. Junaid gets an outside edge to third man for a single
outside off, short of a length delivery. Left alone by Tamim
fuller in length outside off. Tamim unleashes a crispy off drive and gets a couple
fuller on the off stump, Tamim goes more straighter this time as he plays it in the vee for a boundary
width outside off stump, Junaid goes over cover for a couple
short on the off stump, predictable response from Martin as Junaid lets it go
on the leg stump, Junaid turns to deep mid wicket with supple wrists for a couple
bang on the spot, middle stump and on a good length. defended on the back foot,  back to the bowler
on the leg stump, Junaid walks across and turns to square leg. No run taken
short on the middle stump, Junaid locks the wrists and guides to backward point
outside off stump, off  Tamim's outside edge to backward point
on the leg stump, Tamim turns the ball to fine leg for a single
on the middle and leg, Junaid comes onto the front foot and flicks to mid wicket
Dropped ! fuller on the middle, Junaid drives back to Mills, who on his follow through fails to latch on
on the off stump and swinging away a touch, Junaid is squared up by the swing and appreciates
outside off stump, Junaid moves across and leaves it alone
on the leg stump again, Tamim turns to fine leg for a single
on the middle stump, defended on the back foot to the bowler
outside off, fuller in length. Junaid goes for the drive and fails to time  as the ball flies off the outside edge to deep backward point for a couple
on the off and middle, defended on the back foot to the bowler
bounces him this time around. gets under it properly and lets it go
on the leg stump and short in length, left alone
outside off, fuller in length. Tamim checks his drive at the last moment as it goes to short mid on
outside off, Tamim drives again as the ball goes to deep square leg off an inside edge for a couple
on the middle and leg, flicks to square leg
on the middle and off stump, upto the batsman, who guides to backward point
fuller on the leg stump, Tamim drives to long on to take a couple
short outside the off stump, Tamim goes back and defends to cover
on the off stump, goes back a touch and pushes to mid on
on the leg stump, slower in pace. Junaid flicks it over mid wicket for his first boundary in One Day international cricket
outside off and swinging away a touch, left alone by Junaid
on the middle stump, Junaid gets onto the front foot and defends back to the bowler
outside off, swinging away. Junaid drives to cover on the front foot
outside off and Junaid covers the line of the delivery and lets it go
outside off and coming in, defended on the back foot to point
on the leg stump, flicks to fine leg for a single
short on the leg stump, Junaid ducks under it comfortably
on the leg stump, defended on the back foot to square leg
short outside off, Junaid stands tall and drives to extra cover

Persistence pays. Mills kept plugging away on the middle and off line. This time pitches on the fuller length on the middle stump. Junaid lifts it high up in the air as Gillespie comes running across from mid on and takes the catch comfortably
on the off stump, good length. Drives back to the bowler
outside off and swinging away, left alone by Aftab
fuller in length outside off, drives off the front foot to extra cover for a boundary
outside off and left alone by Aftab
short on the middle and leg stump. Aftab ducks under comfortably as he lets it go to the keeper
outside off and swinging away, left alone by Aftab
on the middle and leg, defended on the back foot to mid wicket
outside off, Tamim goes back and defends to backward point
poor delivery, drifts to leg stump, Tamim flicks to fine leg for an easy boundary
on the off stump, back to the grind. Tamim defends on the back foot to cover
on the middle stump, Tamim turns to fine leg
off the good length on the middle stump. drives gun barrel straight back to the stumps at other end
fuller in length outside off, drives to mid off
on the fuller length outside off, Aftab drives back to the bowler
fuller in length on the middle stump, gets under the line of the delivery and lifts it over mid on for a boundary
coming in from the off stump, struck on the pads , going above the stumps so cant be given
fuller on the off stump, Aftab moves across and lifts high in the air as he does not get enough timing and ends up holing out to mid wicket where Fulton takes an easy catch
on the short length, outside off, guided to point
outside off and coming in, Ashraful comes onto the front foot and pushes to mid wicket
short outside off stump, stand and deliver stuff for Ashraful as he smashes it over long off for a boundary
swinging away from the off stump, called a wide
short outside the off stump. Ashraful latches onto it big time as he whips it over square leg for a boundary
outside off stump, Ashraful goes for the drive once more and misses this time
fuller on the middle stump, Ashraful guides to fine leg for a couple
fuller on the middle stump, turns to square leg for a single
outside off stump and short in length. Ashraful lets it go to the keeper
on the leg stump, touch fuller in length. Ashraful nonchalantly flicks over the circle for a boundary. Ominous touch he seems to be in
outside off and left alone to the keeper
Ahoy ! Ashraful latches onto the short ball, pulls it 20 rows back at deep mid wicket fence for a six
fuller in length,  outside off. Drives to cover
There he goes ! outside off and Ashraful walks across and plays his patented shot over fine leg for a boundary
on the leg stump, turns to mid wicket
on the leg stump, Tamim flicks again and fails to beat mid wicket
on the leg stump, defended on the back foot to mid wicket
on the leg stump, turns to square leg
outside off and coming in, guided to point. Tamim needs to get a kick onto the proceedings
short on the middle stumps, on the ribs. Tamim goes back and defends to mid wicket
on the leg stump, defended on the backfoot
outside off and left alone to the keeper
on the middle stump, turns to mid wicket for a single
outside the off stump, and called a wide. Vettori is not impressed
on the middle stump, Tamim pushes to long on for a single
on the middle stump, flicked to mid wicket for a single
on the leg stump, turns to mid wicket. No run taken
short outside off, played with soft hands to point and run across for a single
outside off and Tamim goes fishing. Lucky to get outside edge to third man for a single
outside off. Ashraful drives to cover
on the good length outside off, Ashraful covers the line and defends on the front foot
outside off and coming in. Ashrafuls plonks his front foot down and guides to point
outside off and swinging away. Ashraful plays the cut shot late to third man for a single
on the leg stump, Ashraful flicks to square leg for a single
on the leg stump, drives to long on for a single
on the off stump, forces of the back foot to cover
fuller outside off, drives to long off for a single
on the off stump, drives back to the bowler
on the middle stump, Tamim unable to get it past the bowler
outside off and coming in. guided of the back foot to third man for a single
fuller in length outside off, Tamim drives to cover as the fielder dives and stops a certain boundary
short in length outside off. Guides to point of the back foot
take that ! fuller in  length outside off, drives through cover handsomely for a boundary
short on the middle stump. Nudges to leg side for a single
fuller in length outside off. Ashraful drives to long off for a single
outside off, defended on the back foot
short outside off, cuts fiercely to deep backward point for a boundary
on the leg stump, turns to mid wicket for a single
on the off stump, defends on the leg side
fuller on the off stump. Drives back to the bowler
on the middle stump, drives to long on for a single
outside off and guided to backward point
on the off stump, Tamim goes for the drive and gets an inside edge to mid wicket for a single
fuller in length outside off, Ashraful plays a delectable drive to long off where Mills restricts him to a couple
outside off, guided to point
outside off and short in length, left alone. Surprising it is
fuller in length outside off. Ashraful drives it to the same spot that is long off and beats Mills this time for a boundary
on the middle stump, Tamim sweeps it over mid wicket for a six
drives to long on for a single
moves back and Vettori notices it and fires it in as Ashraful drives it a touch in the air to long off for a single
outside off, Tamim drives it over cover for a boundary
on the middle , defended on the back foot
on the off stump, punches to cover of the back foot
fuller in length outside off. Ashraful drives to cover
short outside the off stump. Ashraful goes back and cuts to point
outside off stump, short in length. Ashraful steps down the track and belts it over mid wicket for a boundary
on the off stump, flicks to deep square leg to bring up his fifty. Special innings this from Ashraful
on the off stump. Tamim pushes to cover on the front foot
outsiode off, Tamim plays the cut late to short third man
outside off, Ashraful cuts to sweeper on the off side for a single
outside off, Tamim drives in the air as it just falls short of the long off fielder
on the leg stump, flicks to mid wicket for a single
outside off, cut to short third man
Dropped on the leg stump, swept to deep mid wicket where Martin drops the catch
turned to fine leg for a couple but called one run short
outside off and short in length. Tamim steps out and lashes it over mid wicket for a six
outside off, defended on the back foot to point
short outside off , drives to cover
short on the leg stump, nudges to mid wicket for a single
fuller on the off stump, Ashraful on the front foot drives back to the bowler
on the leg stump, Ashraful works to mid wicket for a single
drifts onto the leg stump, Ashraful pushes to deep square leg for a single
outside off, drives to deep extra cover for a single
on the middle stump, defended to point
on the middle stump, flicks to square leg for a single
on the leg stump, flicks to deep mid wicket and brings up his fifty
outside off and drives to deep extra cover for a single
outside off, Ashraful goes back and plays the cut late to short third man
wide outside the off stump, Ashraful square drives straight to point
short on the middle stump. Ashraful does not need an invitation to play the pull shot as he latches onto it and pulls it to square leg for a boundary
goes over the head, and called a wide
outside off and short in length. Cuts straight to point
on the off and middle, Ashraful turns the ball to square leg for a single
outside off and Tamim goes for the jugular as he lofts it up in the air as Gillespie gets under it at deep backward point and takes it comfortably
on the leg stump, defended on the front foot
outside the off stump, cut to point
fuller on the off stump. drives in the vee for a boundary
fuller outside off, cut to deep backward point for a single
outside off and coming in, Ashraful gets across and defends on the front foot
on the off and coming in, Ashraful walks across and plays that cheeky little scoop of his past the fine leg for a boundary
short on the middle stump. defended on the back foot
outside off and swinging away. Shakib hangs out his bat to dry
short on the middle stump, Shakib pulls to fine leg for a single
outside off and coming in, slower ball. Ashraful goes back and cuts past point for a boundary
outside off and lets it go this time

outside off and short in length. Ashraful throws it all away once again as he pulls to deep mid wicket where Fulton takes the offering. Ashraful played a special innings here today and lucky are those who watched it
on the leg stump, flicks to fine leg
outside off and swinging away, drives to cover
fuller on the off stump, Shakib goes for the drive and misses and is bowled lock stock and barrel
outside off and left alone to the keeper by Rahim
on the leg stump, short . duks under it
outside off and swinging away, gets a feather edge to McCullum as we are being witness to another of the familiar Bangladesh collapses
on the off stump, guided to point
outside off and swinging away, guidesd to point of the front foot
outside the off stump and left alone
outside the off and coming in, defended on the back foot with soft hands
outside off and swinging away, moves across and leaves it as it is called a wide
outside off, guides to third man for a single
fuller on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
on the leg stump, defends to leg side on the back foot
on the off stump, defended on the front foot onto the pitch
outside off and coming in, fuller in length. Drives straight to extra cover
short outside the off stump, moves across and defends on the back foot
short on the leg stump. Tries to pull and is struck on the gloves as it falls safely and run across for a single
outside off, Reza goes back and guides to backward point
outside off coming in, defended on the front foot to point

short on the off stump, Mehrab steps down the track and decides to leave the ball. The ball flies off the outside edge to backward point where How grabs the offering. I can't imagine what Mehrab was thinking. Excellent stuff from Oram who's now taken three
outside off and coming in, defended to backward point for a single
on the off stump and defended to cover on the front foot
short outside off, cut straight to backward point
outside off and coming in, guided to backward point of the back foot
on the off and coming in. Mashrafe goes back and defends it back to the bowler
outside off, guided to short third man
outside off and coming in, Mashrafe goes back and defends on the back foot
outside off and Mashrafe moves back again and guides to third man for a couple
outside off, tries to cut and misses
fuller outside off, goes for the drive and misses
outside off and coming in, defended on the back foot
on the middle stump, defended on the front foot
fuller in length outside off. Defended on the front foot back to the bowler
on the middle stump. off the inside edge and right onto the box. It can be painful
outside off, short in length. Defended on the back foot to point
fuller in length on the off stump. Reza gets back and  defends back to the bowler
outside off and coming in, Mashrafe lets it go
fuller in length outside off as Mashrafe launches it to long off , where the catch is taken and is not out because he over steps
fuller outside off and coming in, Reza misses it and is bowled , but again it is a free hit, so can't be out
outside off, drives to mid on
outside off and swinging away, left alone to the keeper
outside off and swinging away, cuts to deep backward point and gets off the mark
fuller in length outside off, defended on the back foot
outside off and coming in, guided to deep backward point for a single
on the middle stump, Mashrafe goes back and guides to third man for a single
short outside off, cut late to short third man. No run taken
outside off, plays the cut shot to short third man again as he is unable to pierce the field
on the good length outside off, tries to guide it and is still unable to pierce the third man region
outside off and coming in, tries to cut and misses it by a margin
outside off, short in length. tries to cut and misses
on the middle and coming in, Mashrafe moves back and the ball follows him as he tries to swerve away
outside off and coming in, defended on the back foot to cover
short on the off and middle, Mashrafe steps down and tries to cut. Misses the ball altogether
outside off, coming in from short of length. Mashrafe guides to third man for a single
outside off and swinging away a touch. Reza tries to feel the ball and misses
short in length, goes inside out over cover for a boundary
outside off and coming in, defended on the back foot to point
fuller in length outside off, drives to sweeper on the off side for a single
on the leg stump, flicks to mid wicket for a single
short and coming in from the off stump. Mashrafe moves back and tries to get cheeky. Misses the ball altogether
short ball on the middle stump, Mashrafe ducks under it
outside off and coming in, Reza defends on the back foot
full in length outside off, drives to extra cover
outside off and coming in, defended on the back foot to point
short outside off, defended on the back foot to point
finally pierces the gap behind square on the off side for a single
on the leg stump, defended on the front foot to mid wicket
back to the groove it is for Reza, plays the cut shot straight to the fielder
short outside off, defended on the front foot to mid wicket
Reza trying the late cut too often, perishes in the attempt also as Styris at wide first slip takes the catch easily. Sad that Bangladesh have thrown away a good start
fuller in length outside off. Text book forward defense stroke
outside off and swinging away. left alone by Razzaq
on the off stump on a good length. Razzaq tries to defend and misses
on the leg stump. Tries to defend and misses and is rapped on the pads
on the leg stump, defends on the leg side
on the good length on the middle stump. Drives to long off for a single
outside off , drives to long off for a single
short outside off and cut to deep extra cover for a single
on the middle stump, flicks to square leg
on the leg stump, slogs it over mid wicket for a boundary
on the off stump, gets an inside edge onto his pads to the keeper
fuller on the middle stump. Drives back to the bowler
full toss on the middle stump. Mashrafe moves back and helps it on it's way to Oram at long off who takes a simple catch
outside off and left alone
outside off and tries to defend and misses
on the off stump, defended on the front foot back to the bowler
outside the leg stump and rapped on the pads
arm ball outside off, left alone
on the leg stump, flicks to fine leg for a single
fuller outside off, smashes back past the bowler for a boundary
on the leg stump, pushes to mid wicket for a single
on the middle stump, Razzaq launches it over deep mid wicket for a six
short ball on the middle stump, Razzaq ducks under the delivery
short on the middle stump. Razzaq swerves away from the line of delivery
short outside off stump, pulled deep backward square leg for a boundary
on the off stump, Razzaq flicks it square on the leg side as the umpire cops a blow and saves some runs for Kiwis
on the leg stump, flicks to mid wicket for a single
on the off stump, flicks to fine leg
on the middle stump and defended on the front foot
fuller outside off, drives to long off for a single
on the leg stump, sweeps to deep mid wicket for a couple
short on the middle stump, flicks to mid wicket for a single
on the good length outside off, defended on the front foot
outside off and coming in, flicks to square leg for a couple
on the leg stump, goes to the keeper
on the off stump, guides to point and sets off for a single as How who comes in from backward point throws the stumps down and finds Shahadat short of his crease

inn2.comm: outside off and swinging away, left alone to the keeper
short on the off and coming in, tries to pull and misses. Rapped on the pads, high infact so can't be given out
outside off and coming in, defended on the front foot
on the leg stump, flicks to mid wicket for a couple
off the outside edge to third man for a single
short outside off, fends it away to third man for a single
fuller on the off stump, drives to cover
fuller on the leg stump, flicks to short fine leg
outside off and keeping the line, left alone to the keeper
on the middle stump, pushes to mid wicket on the front foot. Impeccable line it is
outside off and defended on the front foot to point
fuller on the leg stump, pushes wide of the mid on for a single
outside off and coming in, defended on the front foot to cover for a single
on the off stump, defended on the back foot to cover
swinging wildly outside off, called a wide
short outside off stump, How comes out and defends on the front foot to point
on the off stump, How moves back and plays with soft hands onto the pitch and run across for a single
outside off and defended on the back foot
outside the off and coming in, moves back and defends back to the bowler
outside off and swinging away, left alone to the keeper
outside off and coming in, gets a bottom edge on the way to first slip
on the off stump and coming in, drives to mid on off the front foot
fuller on the middle stump, drives down the ground in the vee for three runs
fuller outside off, drives on the front foot to mid off. Can't pierce the field
outside off and coming in, drives to the left of cover for a single
outside off and short in length. Creams it through cover for a boundary. It went there in a flash
outside off and coming in. Defended on the front foot back to the bowler
on the off stump and coming in, defended to cover with soft hands
outside off, McCullum drives of the front foot to point
full on the leg stump, McCullum defends on the front foot. Failed to cash on the opportunity
full outside off, drives down the ground for a boundary
full on the off stump, How has a difficulty in digging it out
outside off and coming in, How comes forward and defends on the front foot
short outside off. How goes for the pull on the front foot and misses the ball
fuller on the leg and middle. Flicks to backward square leg for a couple
on the good length outside off, drives to cover on the front foot
outside off and swinging away, guides to third man for a single
on the legs, turns it off his hips for three runs
outside off, fuller in length, slices the off side field into half on the way to boundary
on the leg stump, flicks to fine leg for a couple
on the leg stump, defended on the front foot to square leg
outside off and coming in, defended on the front foot to cover
slower delivery on the middle stump, on the good length. Tries to pull and is rapped on the pads. Going down leg
on the leg stump, flicks to square leg for a single
outside off and coming in. Driven off the back foot to cover
on the leg stump, flicks to deep mid wicket for a couple of runs
on the middle stump and coming in, gets an inside edge back onto his pads
short outside the off stump. Defended back to the bowler on the back foot
on the middle and leg, off the pads to square leg
on the leg stump, drives to mid on for a single
on the off stump, draws McCullum forward, who defends it back to the bowler
fuller on the off stump, drives to the left of mid on for a single
on the middle stump, defended back to the bowler
on the leg stump, flicked to square leg for a single
on the legs again, How flicks to deep mid wicket for three runs
outside off, How drives to mid on for a single
outside off and coming in, played with soft hands to point for a single
outside off and keeping the line, defended on the front foot back to the bowler
outside off and coming in, drives on the rise to mid off
yorker length delivery outside off. How digs it out safely
short outside off and coming in. Defended on the front foot to cover
on the leg stump, turns it away to short fine leg
on the middle stump, defended back to the bowler
on the leg stump, swept to fine leg
on the off stump, comes down the track and defends
outside off, comes down the track and smashes it past cover for a boundary
on the off stump, defended on the front foot to cover
short outside off, pulls majestically through square leg for a boundary
on the good length outside off, drives to mid off on the front foot
on the leg stump, flicked to mid wicket off the back foot
fuller in length outside off, drives to mid off on the front foot
outside off and coming in, moves across and defends on the front foot to cover
outside off, fuller in length. Drives wide off the mid off fielder for a boundary
on the leg stump, defended back to the bowler
outside off, steps out and tries to smash it over mid on, does not time it well
on the off stump, defended on the front foot
outside off, moves back and across and cuts to sweeper for a single
on the leg stump, pushes to mid wicket
on the off stump, defended to covers on the front foot
poor start, starts off with a wide down the leg side
on the middle stump, defends to mid wicket with soft hands for a single
outside off, defends on the front foot to short mid off
short on the off stump, pulled to deep square leg for a single
short outside leg stump, tries to pull and gets deflected from the thigh pad
on the off stump, pulled to fine leg for a single
outside off and coming in, defended on the front foot back to the bowler
on the leg stump, flicks to square leg

on the off stump, defended on the front foot to mid on

fuller on the off stump, drives to mid off for a single

on the off stump, drives to cover

on the off stump, McCullum steps down the track and lifts it over long off fence for a six. Breaks the shackles
on the leg stump, drives to mid on for a single
on the legs, turns to fine leg for a single
on the leg stump, drives on the front foot to mid on
on the leg stump, flicks to mid wicket for a single

up up and away! McCullum comes down the track and lifts it over long on for a six
on the legs, comes down the track and gets an inside edge to fine leg
full outside off, drives to mid off, who throws down the stumps, batsmen run across on a rebound
outside off and coming in, ever so slower. McCullum surprised by the lack of pace tamely lobs back the ball to the bowler who accepts it with glee
on the leg stump, flicked to square leg for a single
